service_def.name: H264VideoEncoding
service_def.description: The H264 Video Encoding Service provides a mechanism for querying and configuring the H264 encoding of one or more video sensors
service_def.assumptions: Messages may be delayed, lost or reordered.

message_def.name: SetH264VideoEncodingConfiguration
message_def.description: This message is used to set the active configuration for one or more H264 encoded video streams.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: Note: 0 is not a valid VisualSensorID value

fixed_field.name: Profile
fixed_field.interpretation: Enumeration for h264 profile setting.

fixed_field.name: Level
fixed_field.interpretation: Enumeration for target h264 level.

fixed_field.name: Preset
fixed_field.interpretation: Preconfigured settings for hardware specific H264 settings. The actual values for each preset are not specified by the standard and are up to the implementation.

fixed_field.name: GroupOfPictures
fixed_field.interpretation: Number of interim frames before sending a key frame

fixed_field.name: GradualDecoderRefreshOnOff
fixed_field.interpretation: Turn on/off Gradual Decoder Refresh, also called Periodic Intra Refresh.

fixed_field.name: RegionOfInterestOnOff
fixed_field.interpretation: Turn on/off region of interest (foveation) encoding, if supported. The region of interest is specified by the RegionOfInterestParams array.

fixed_field.name: IntraMacroRefresh
fixed_field.interpretation: This parameter is the random intra macroblock refresh; it provides the refresh rate in Macroblocks per picture.

fixed_field.name: X_Start
fixed_field.interpretation: Horizontal start location of high bitrate window, measured as percent of total image width from the left

fixed_field.name: Y_Start
fixed_field.interpretation: Vertical start location of high bitrate window, measured as percent of total image height from the top

fixed_field.name: Width
fixed_field.interpretation: Width of high bitrate window, measured as percent of total image width

fixed_field.name: Height
fixed_field.interpretation: Height of high bitrate window , measured as percent of total image height

fixed_field.name: HighBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitrate of ROI window, measured in kilobits per second

fixed_field.name: LowBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitrate of ROI window, measured in kilobits per second

fixed_field.name: GDR_Duration
fixed_field.interpretation: The number of frames needed to completely refresh the image

fixed_field.name: GDR_Interval
fixed_field.interpretation: The number of frames that need to be transmitted before starting a new GDR cycle. Note that the interval must be greater than or equal to the duration

message_def.name: QueryH264VideoEncodingCapabilities
message_def.description: This message must be used to query for the H264 encoding capabilities of one or more visual sensors on the receiving service.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: The ID of the sensor for which the capabilities are being queried.Note: A value of 0 shall be interpreted as all associated sensors.

message_def.name: QueryH264VideoEncodingConfiguration
message_def.description: This message must be used to query for the currently configured H264 encoding parameters.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: The ID of the sensor for which the capabilities are being queried.Note: A value of 0 shall be interpreted as all associated sensors.

message_def.name: ConfirmSensorConfiguration
message_def.description: This message is used to notify a client component that the configuration has been received with the values specified in the corresponding set message with Request ID matching the value of field 1 of this message. If the specified configuration request is deemed valid, the SensorIdRec is returned with the matching SensorID (or illuminatorID) of the sensor (or illuminator) for which the configuration was successfully set. If the requested configuration is invalid, one of the ErrorRec types shall be returned (depending on the source message) with an error code and description of the configuration setting which was deemed invalid.

fixed_field.name: MessageID
fixed_field.interpretation: A two byte field to hold the message ID of a message

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: ID of the sensor. Zero (0) is not a valid ID in this message.

message_def.name: ReportH264VideoEncodingCapabilities
message_def.description: This message is used to report which configuration options are supported on one or more H264 encoded video streams.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: Note: 0 is not a valid VisualSensorID value

bit_field.name: SupportedProfiles
bit_field.interpretation: A high value (1) for a bit means the profile is supported.

bit_field.name: SupportedLevels
bit_field.interpretation: A high value (1) for a bit means the level is supported.

bit_field.name: SupportedPresets
bit_field.interpretation: A high value (1) for a bit means the preset is supported.

fixed_field.name: GroupOfPicturesSupported
fixed_field.interpretation: Boolean for Group of Pictures support

fixed_field.name: GradualDecoderRefreshSupported
fixed_field.interpretation: Boolean for Gradual Decoder Refresh (Periodic Intra Refresh) support

fixed_field.name: RegionOfInterestSupported
fixed_field.interpretation: Boolean for Region of Interest (foveation) support

message_def.name: ReportH264VideoEncodingConfiguration
message_def.description: This message is used to report the active configuration for one or more H264 encoded video streams.

fixed_field.name: SensorID
fixed_field.interpretation: Note: 0 is not a valid VisualSensorID value

fixed_field.name: Profile
fixed_field.interpretation: Enumeration for h264 profile setting.

fixed_field.name: Level
fixed_field.interpretation: Enumeration for target h264 level.

fixed_field.name: Preset
fixed_field.interpretation: Preconfigured settings for hardware specific H264 settings. The actual values for each preset are not specified by the standard and are up to the implementation.

fixed_field.name: GroupOfPictures
fixed_field.interpretation: Number of interim frames before sending a key frame

fixed_field.name: GradualDecoderRefreshOnOff
fixed_field.interpretation: Turn on/off Gradual Decoder Refresh, also called Periodic Intra Refresh.

fixed_field.name: RegionOfInterestOnOff
fixed_field.interpretation: Turn on/off region of interest (foveation) encoding, if supported. The region of interest is specified by the RegionOfInterestParams array.

fixed_field.name: IntraMacroRefresh
fixed_field.interpretation: This parameter is the random intra macroblock refresh; it provides the refresh rate in Macroblocks per picture.

fixed_field.name: X_Start
fixed_field.interpretation: Horizontal start location of high bitrate window, measured as percent of total image width from the left

fixed_field.name: Y_Start
fixed_field.interpretation: Vertical start location of high bitrate window, measured as percent of total image height from the top

fixed_field.name: Width
fixed_field.interpretation: Width of high bitrate window, measured as percent of total image width

fixed_field.name: Height
fixed_field.interpretation: Height of high bitrate window , measured as percent of total image height

fixed_field.name: HighBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitrate of ROI window, measured in kilobits per second

fixed_field.name: LowBitRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Bitrate of ROI window, measured in kilobits per second

fixed_field.name: GDR_Duration
fixed_field.interpretation: The number of frames needed to completely refresh the image

fixed_field.name: GDR_Interval
fixed_field.interpretation: The number of frames that need to be transmitted before starting a new GDR cycle. Note that the interval must be greater than or equal to the duration

action.name: sendReportH264VideoEncodingCapabilities
action.interpretation: Send a ReportH264VideoEncodingCapabilities message to the original requestor

action.name: sendReportH264VideoEncodingConfiguration
action.interpretation: Send a ReportH264VideoEncodingConfiguration message to the original requestor

guard.interpretation: True if the command message was received from the client currently controlling this component

action.name: setH264VideoEncodingConfig
action.interpretation: Update the H264 encoding configuration if valid for the specified sensor ID

action.name: sendConfirmSensorConfiguration
action.interpretation: Send sendConfirmSensorConfiguration message with confirmation or error code for each specified sensor ID

action.name: sendReportH264VideoEncodingCapabilities
action.interpretation: Send a ReportH264VideoEncodingCapabilities message to the original requestor

action.name: sendReportH264VideoEncodingConfiguration
action.interpretation: Send a ReportH264VideoEncodingConfiguration message to the original requestor
